original_title: Sri Lanka rupee opens at 328.30/60 to the US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee opened at 328.30/60 to the US dollar on Thursday, from 329.25/50 the previous day, dealers said.
On the Colombo Stock Exchange, the All Share Price Index was up 0.71 percent at 10,587.
The S&P SL20 was up 0.72 percent at 2,999. Turnover was 64 million.
A bond maturing on 01.08.2026 was quoted at 14.10/20 percent from 14.10/25 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 was quoted at 14.30/40 percent from 14.15/30 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2028 was quoted at 14.30/45 percent from 14.30/40 percent.
